27018.title: Oct 9 - Red Deer (Sunnybrook, Anders Park and surrounding areas) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
27018.summary:
Affected Area: Red Deer (Sunnybrook, Anders Park and surrounding areas)

Affected Services: Internet, Business Internet, Phone, Business Phone, Digital TV, VOD, Gateway, BlueCurve TV, WiFi Access Points

Reference Number: INC0850941

Summary: Some customers in the Sunnybrook, Anders Park and surrounding areas of Red Deer are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Live Updates:

10/09/2020 17:02 MT Technicians are on-site investigating this issue.
10/09/2020 14:26 MT We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.

26904.title: Oct 7 – Calgary (Whitehorn) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
26904.summary:
Affected Area: Calgary (Whitehorn)

Affected Services: Internet, Business Internet, Phone, Business Phone, Digital TV, VOD, Gateway, BlueCurve TV, WiFi Access Points

Reference Number: INC0849661

Summary: Some customers in the Whitehorn area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Live Updates:

10/09/2020 07:15 MT Technicians have restored services to the area. We thank you for your patience.
10/08/2020 10:55 MT Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve.
10/07/2020 13:06 MT Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. 
10/07/2020 12:43 MT We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
